oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Children's radio performances (excerpts)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpts of a radio program featuring musical performances by children. Circa late 1940s, possibly recorded in Lubbock, TX. See also [ TR001804_1 ] and [ TR001805 ].
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Memphis Yodel ([Unknown]) -- [Unidentified a cappella folk song] -- Comedy routine ([Unidentified]) -- My Adobe Hacienda ([Unidentified]) -- Host introduces Johnny/Johnnie [Last name unidentified] -- I'm Afraid To Love You (Johnny/Johnnie [Last name unidentified]) (incomplete) -- Host introduces Carolyn Cole -- I Wish I Didn't Love You So ([Unidentified] vocals, Carolyn Cole piano) (incomplete)
